title: Andrea Corr
summary: Andrea Jane Corr MBE (born 17 May 1974) is an Irish singer, songwriter, musician, author and actress. Corr debuted in 1990 as the lead singer of the Celtic folk rock and pop rock group The Corrs along with her three elder siblings Caroline, Sharon  and Jim. Aside from singing lead vocals, Corr plays the tin whistle, the ukulele and the piano.[1]
